name: astral-surveyor
description: A chill, tranquil space exploration game

scripts.copy-assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); fs.mkdirSync('dist', {recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync('game.html', 'dist/index.html'); fs.cpSync('css', 'dist/css', {recursive:true});"
scripts.serve: node -e "const http=require('http'); const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const url=require('url'); const mime={'html':'text/html','js':'application/javascript','css':'text/css','png':'image/png','jpg':'image/jpeg','svg':'image/svg+xml'}; const server=http.createServer((req,res)=>{const parsedUrl=url.parse(req.url); let filePath=parsedUrl.pathname; if(filePath==='/' || parsedUrl.search){filePath='index.html';} const file=path.join('dist',filePath); if(!fs.existsSync(file)){res.writeHead(404);res.end('Not found');return;} const ext=path.extname(file).slice(1); res.writeHead(200,{'Content-Type':mime[ext]||'text/plain','Access-Control-Allow-Origin':'*'}); fs.createReadStream(file).pipe(res);}); server.listen(3000,()=>console.log('ğŸš€ Server running at http://localhost:3000\nğŸ“ Serving dist/ directory\nğŸ”„ Run npm run build to update files'));"
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
